channel.title: proxysql on Knowledge base
channel.description: Recent content in proxysql on Knowledge base

item.title: Debug
item.description: ProxySQL Error: connection is locked to hostgroup 11 but trying to reach hostgroup 10 set mysql-set_query_lock_on_hostgroup=0; load mysql variables to runtime; save mysql variables to disk;Restart proxysql service

item.title: Connect
item.description: Connect to proxysql instance mysql -u admin -padmin -h 127.0.0.1 -P6032 --prompt 'ProxySQL Admin> '
